 2003-08602003-06-05CCRA,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Act, 2001
PrecisLOSSES OF BULK SPIRITS AND PACKAGED ALCOHOL REGULATIONS which specify the circumstances and conditions where it would not be necessary to pay the excise duty on wine and spirits that were lost as a result of spoilage, fire, evaporation and breakage or in the manufacturing, handling and transport of these goods, and take effect on July 1, 2003.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0206 Publication Date: 2003-06-18
AttachmentsAttachment
